socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill. Minions, Totems, Traps and Mines cannot gain Inspiration Charges.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 34% reduced Mana Cost

Gain an Inspiration Charge when you Spend Mana on Upfront
Costs or Effects of Supported Skills
Lose all Inspiration Charges after Spending a total of 730 Mana on Upfront Costs and Effects of Supported Skills
Supported Skills deal 5% more Elemental Damage per Inspiration Charge
Supported Skills have 8% increased Critical Strike Chance per Inspiration Charge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Lightning, Spell, AoE, Chaining, Duration, Brand

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a magical brand which can attach to a nearby enemy. It periodically activates while attached, firing beams which deal damage to nearby enemies and those around them. The brand will detach if the enemy dies.
explicitMods: Deals 92 to 277 Lightning Damage
Activates every 0.5 seconds while Attached
Increases and Reductions to Cast Speed also apply to this Skill's Activation frequency
Can be Attached for a total Duration of 5.00 seconds
Can be Detached for a total Duration of 6.00 seconds
Sends beams to 3 Enemies, including the Branded Enemy
Deals 130% more Damage with Hits against Branded Enemy
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

who dream of enlightenment

explicitMods: Curse Enemies with Socketed Hex Curse Gem on Hit
flavourText: So great was the thaumaturgy of a bloodpriest's mark,
that sacrifices soon welcomed their death.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all enemies in an area, lowering their action speed and making other effects on them expire more slowly.

Cursed Rare and Unique Enemies have 18% less Action Speed

Trigger a Socketed Bow Skill when you Attack with a Bow, with a 1 second Cooldown

+67 to maximum Life

a sinister shaft surreptitiously shot slays a scoundrel.
I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
Has no Attribute Requirements
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Physical, Chaos, Orb

socketedItems.secDescrText: Creates a Void Sphere which Hinders enemies in an area around it, with the debuff being stronger on enemies closer to the sphere. It also regularly releases pulses of area damage. The Void Sphere will consume the corpses of any enemies which die in its area. Can only have one Void Sphere at a time.
explicitMods: Deals 27 to 40 Physical Damage
Void Sphere has 10% increased Pulse Frequency
Base duration is 5.00 seconds
Pulses every 0.40 seconds
40% of Physical Damage Converted to Chaos Damage
Enemies in range are Hindered, with up to 30% reduced Movement Speed, based on distance from the Void Sphere
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Gain a buff that makes you faster, harder to detect, and grants Phasing, letting you pass through enemies. Base secondary duration is 0.20 seconds
30% more Melee Physical Damage
100% increased Skill Duration per Frenzy Charge removed
Buff grants 39% increased Movement Speed
Buff grants Phasing
Buff grants 100% increased Stealth
